languages.text: {n}Улыбка становится шире.{/n} "Оно всегда того стоит. Ты и сам{mf||а} поймешь".
{n}Her smile widens.{/n} "It is always worth it. You will understand this yourself."
languages.original_text: {n}Улыбка становится шире.{/n} "Оно всегда того стоит. Ты и сам{mf||а} поймешь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Her smile grows bigger.{/n} "It is always worth it. You will understand it yourself."
traits.speaker: Teodora

languages.text: {n}Son sourire s'élargit et elle répond :{/n} « Cela en vaut toujours la peine. Vous finirez par le comprendre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her smile widens.{/n} "It is always worth it. You will understand this yourself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son sourire s'élargit et elle répond :{/n} « Cela en vaut toujours la peine. Vous finirez par le comprendre. »
traits.speaker: Teodora

languages.text: {n}Su sonrisa se ensancha.{/n} «Siempre merece la pena. Tú también lo entenderás».
languages.original_text: {n}Her smile widens.{/n} "It is always worth it. You will understand this yourself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su sonrisa se ensancha.{/n} «Siempre merece la pena. Tú también lo entenderás».
traits.speaker: Teodora

languages.text: {n}她的笑容变得更加灿烂。{/n}“总归是值得的，你以后会明白的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her smile widens.{/n} "It is always worth it. You will understand this yourself."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的笑容变得更加灿烂。{/n}“总归是值得的，你以后会明白的。”
traits.speaker: Teodora

languages.text: {n}Ihr Lächeln wird breiter.{/n} "Es ist es immer wert. Ihr werdet es selbst verstehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Her smile widens.{/n} "It is always worth it. You will understand this yourself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihr Lächeln wächst an.{/n} "Es ist es immer wert. Das werdet Ihr auch noch verstehen lernen."
traits.speaker: Teodora

languages.text: {n}彼女の笑みが広がる。{/n}「必ずやその価値はあるわ。あなたも、きっとそれを理解する」
languages.original_text: {n}Her smile widens.{/n} "It is always worth it. You will understand this yourself."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の笑みが広がる。{/n}「必ずやその価値はあるわ。あなたも、きっとそれを理解する」
traits.speaker: Teodora

languages.text: {n}Gülümsemesi genişliyor.{/n} "Değdi tabii. Bunu sen de anlayacaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}Her smile widens.{/n} "It is always worth it. You will understand this yourself."
